repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits

summary.p: The Nālaṭiyār, complete text with commentary by Nālaṭitēvar (?), preceded by 5 satellite stanzas as Ciṟappu Pāyiram.

The commentary partly overlaps Patumaṉār's commentary in Nālaṭiyār (1980), but does not correspond to any of the commentaries in the three editions mentioned in our bibliography. Nālaṭittēvar is also mentioned in the colophon to TSM 56-1.64, but there is no commentary.

The manuscript contains an additional title page (U1), usual with manuscripts from the Ariel collection, a Ciṟappu Pāyiram (U2, f1r and following), a colophon (U2, f67v) with a date, as well as chapter titles and pratīka-s (U2).
Description by Eva Wilden based on the digital images available on Gallica.
Original manuscript examined by Emmanuel Francis (November 2022).
Dimensions assessed at the time of examination.

extent.measure: {1} + 67 + {1} (U1 + U2 + U3). 176 folios according to Vinson (1868) and Cabaton (1912)

collation.desc: 1 bifolio = Title Page (additional). No foliation. Verso blank.
67 folios = Nālaṭiyār: Text & Commentary. Tamil foliation 1-67.
1 folio = guard leaf. No foliation. Blank recto verso.

supportDesc.condition: Partly in good condition, partly worm-eaten.

handNote.desc: Hand #2. Traditional script with modern ṟa. Ariel's title page scribe.

additions.desc: BnF current shelfmark sticker: INDIEN 60 (front cover, recto).
BnF donation sticker DON N° (front cover, recto).
Shelfmark sticker (Société Asiatique?), written in black ink: 417 (f[1]r).

binding.p: Pinewood covers apparently fabricated in the BnF.

origin.origDate:
Internally dated to the year cittirāvutti (i.e. cittirapāṉu?) of the Jovian cycle, that is, CE 1822-1823, 1762-1763, 1702-1703, etc. See colophon (U2, f67v2). Dated to circa 1760 by Vinson (1868) and to 1760 by Cabaton (1912), on unstated grounds (presumably palaeographical and material analysis arguments). Not after 1854, since part of the collection of Édouard Ariel (1818-1854), bequeathed in 1855 to the Société Asiatique, Paris (Rosny 1868).
3rd April 1883(?); date Ariel 1760.

provenance.p: Owned by Édouard Ariel (1818-1854). Bequeathed by Édouard Ariel to Société Asiatique (Rosny 1868, p. 177).

acquisition.p: Received, August 1st, 1866, from the Société Asiatique. See BnF, département des Manuscrits, inventaire 7 = Dons: manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1848-1895, no. 1192.

listBibl.bibl: Nālaṭiyār. 1921. Camaṇamuṉivarkaḷ iyaṟṟiya Nālaṭiyār mūlamum teḷiporuḷ viḷakkamum. uraiyāciriyar Vai. Mu. Caṭakōparāmānujācāriyar/Cē. Kiruṣṇamācariyar. iraṇṭām patippu. Ceṉṉai: Śrī Kaṇēc Accukkūṭṭam.
Nālaṭiyār. 1964. Patiṉeṇkīḻkkaṇakku Nālaṭiyār urai. uraiyāciriyar Ti. Cu. Pālacuntaram Piḷḷai. Reprint. Ceṉṉai: Kaḻakam. [1st ed. 1945, rep. 1949, 1953, 1957, 1961]

Nālaṭiyār. 1980. Nālaṭiyār uraivaḷam (mūlamum mūṉṟu paḻaiya uraikaḷum aṭaṅkiyatu). 2 vols. patippāciriyarkaḷ S. Mutturatṉa Mutaliyār/M.R. Kantacāmi Piḷḷai. 2nd edition. Tañcāvūr: Makārājā Cāpōjiyiṉ Caracuvati Makāl Nūl Nilayam. [1st ed. 1953]
Cabaton, Antoine. 1912. Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois & malayo-polynésiens. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits. Paris: E. Leroux. — See p. 13, no. 60.
Rosny, Léon de. 1868. La bibliothèque tamoule de M. Ariel, de Pondichéry. In Variétés orientales, 177‒224. Paris: Maisonneuve.
Vinson, Julien & Feer, Léon & s.n. 1866-. Catalogue des manuscrits tamouls et télingas. Manuscript, BnF Indien 577. — See f. 20r, no. 60.

Vinson, Julien. 1868. Manuscrits tamouls. Proofreadings of the catalogue for Tamoul 1-204 (old shelfmark). Printed by the atelier oriental de l’Imprimerie nationale. BnF “4-IMPROR-77 (B)” — See p. 20, n0. 60. — The same proofreadings with black ink handwritten corrections are found in Vinson et al. (1866-, f1-f49).

encodingDesc.p: General ― Unmarked length of ō and ē supplied. Unmarked puḷḷi supplied. Conjectural reading (text unclear) between parentheses. Supplied reading (text lost) between square brackets. Alternative readings separated by slash. In transliteration ― Unmarked elided overshort u supplied as an apostrophe. Uppercase for initial vowels. Symbols between curly brackets. Abbreviations ― c = column; f = folio; lf = library foliation; lm = left margin; r = recto; rm = right margin; u / U followed by a number = unit (codicological and/or textual); v = verso.

revisionDesc.change: Updated to TST encoding conventions by Emmanuel FRANCIS. Version 1, May 2022.
Revised and enlarged by Emmanuel FRANCIS. Version 2, November 2022.
Revised and enlarged by Emmanuel FRANCIS after examination of the original manuscript. Version 3, November 2022.

body.ab:
nālaṭitēvar urai nūṟpāpāyiracciṟappu
vāṉiṭu villiṉ varalaṟiyā vāymaiyāṟ
kāṉilan tōyāk kaṭavuḷai – yāṉilañ
ceṉṉi yuṟavaṇaṅkic cērtumem muḷḷattu
muṉṉi yavaimuṭika veṉṟu 1
Found in the Uraippāyiram of the 1921 edition, p. 6, as Kaṭavuḷ Vāḻttu in the Kaḻakam edition, p.1, and in the Caracuvatimakāl edition, p. 12.
veḷḷāṉ marapukku vētameṉa
c cāṉṟōrka
ḷellāruṅ kūṭi yeṭutturaittuc – collāynta
nālaṭi ṉāṉūṟu naṉkiṉitā meṉmaṉattē
cīlamuṭa ṉiṟkavē ceppu 2
Found in the 1980 Caracuvatimakāl edition, p. 1, together with 2 further verses.
maṉṉaṉ vaḻutiyarkōṉ vaikaip pe
yarāṟṟi
leṇṇi yirunāṉkō rāyiravar – Uṉṉi
yeḻutiyiṭu mēṭṭi letirē naṭanta
paḻutilā nālaṭiyaip pār 3
Found in the Varalāṟu of the 1921 edition, p. 1.
paraṅkuṉ ṟorupaka mapparam paḷḷi
yiruṅkuṉṟam pērā
cai yāṉai – yaruṅkuṉṟa
meṉṟeṭṭu veṟpu meṭuttiyampa vallārkkuc
ceṉṟeṭṭu mōviraivit tīṅku 4
Eṇperuṅ kuṉṟat teṇṇāyira muṉivar
paṇporuntap pāṭiyapā
ṉāṉūṟun taṇporunta
nīretirkoṇ ṭōṭutalāl nīṉṟicaip pāmeṉṟitaṉaip
pāretir koṇṭārpayaṉaip parattu 5
ciṟappuppāyiram muṟṟum civacuppiramaṇiyakaṭāṣcam

celvanilaiyā
mai ~ ~ ~ decade title
tukaṭī
celvam nilaiyāmai ~ Aḵtāvaṉ ~ poruḷ ~ Aracaraṭci ~ yitumutalāyiṉavai celvamātali ṉaḵtunilaiyillaiyeṉpatu ~ Aṟam nilaiyeṉpatu paṟṟi ivai poruḷuṭaṉ muyaṅkiya teṉka kūṟiṉa ~
Arucuvai yuṇṭi ~
yamarntillā ḷūṭṭa ~
maṟucikai nīkkiyuṇ ṭākum ~ vaṟiṉārāyc
ceṉṟirappa rōriṭattiṟ kēṟeṉil celvamoṉ
ṟuṇṭāka vaikkappāṟ ṟaṉṟu Eṉṟatu Aṟucuvaiyum poruntiya vuṇṭiyai virumpi maṉaiyā
ḷuṭṭa muṟcikai nīkkip piṟcikaiyuṇṭāru matarittiraṇpañariṭattiṟ poykkūḻiṉai yirapparākalē celvattai niṉaiyuṇṭeṉṟu niṉaikkappaṭāteṉṟavāṟu ~ Aṟucuvai titittal ~ puḷittal ~ kūrt
tal ~ tuvarttal ~ kārttal ~ kaittala ~ Aṟuvakai ~ maṟucikaiyeṉṟatu ~ muṟcikai nīkkip piṟacikai yuṇpateṉa valaika vaḻakkam ~ kūḻaviṉaippeyar 1
kaṇmūṉ ṟuṭaiyāṉuṅ kākkaiyum paiyaravu
meṉṉīṉṟa yāyum piḻaittateṉ
– poṉṉiṉṟa
kōṅkarum peṉṉa mulaiyāy poruḷvayiṟ
pāṅkaṉuñ ceṉṟa ṉeṟi
Etu talaimakaḷ pirivāṟṟāmaiyait tōḻikkuc colliyatu mūṉṟu kaṇṇiṉaiyuṭaiya civaṉum kākkaiyum paṭattaiyuṭaiya
pāmpum yeṉṉaip petta tāyum yāṉ varuntac ceyta kuṟṟaṅkaḷ yātumillai poṉpōluṅ kōṅkarum piṉaiyotta mulaiyiṉaiyuṭaiyavaḷē poruḷ tēṭap pōṉa nāyakaṉ pōṉa vaḻiyē nammai varuttañ ce
yavateṉṟavāṟu ~ kaṇmūṉṟuṭaiya civaṉ piḻaiceytatu kāmaṉai yuruvaḻittum piṉṉaiyu mavaṉai yuṇṭākkiṉa paṭiyiṉālē ~ kākkai varuttañ ceyvitttaṟkuk kāraṇaṅ kuyil muṭṭaiyiṭa Ataṉai vaḷarntuk kūvavaitantām ~ pāmpu
varuttañ ceyvittaṟku kāraṇam ~ tāṉ muḻaṅkiṉa cantiraṉai cerippittuk koḷḷāmal tirumpivippatām ~ tāy varuttañ ceyvittaṟku kāraṇam ~ taṉṉaip pettu vaḷarttu varuntavaittatām ~ ye
ṉṟa v-āṟu 10 ~ muṟṟum Ākaviyal ~ 3kku ~ Atikāram – 40kku ~ veṇpā ~ 400 ~ muṭintatu ~ cittiraravutti vaṟuṭam paiṅkuṉi mācam – 22 maṅkalavāram ṉāḷ Eḻuti muṭintatu Aṇaṅkuvayal cūḻumāṉa tirumēvu miṇarvillai
vācamē vāḻunatiṇai maliyum muttukkumaraṉ ṟaṉ muṉmaintaṉ kantaṉoṭu cuppumayila ṉālaṭiyār cūḻ Itaṉ iyalpu ~ villavaṉ nallūril mēviya muttukumarp piḷḷaikumarāṉ kantacuvāmi ṉālaṭi
yār uraiyuṭaṉē yeḻutiṉatu civakurukaṭāṣcamē Uṇṭākavum civacuppiramaṇiyak kaṭavuḷ pātamē tuṇai
